WorkItem.Description: In the Warlock model of Rawr 2.2.0b3 the 3% Hit value from Misery or Improved Faerie Fire is not added into the Basic Stat listing of Hit %, thus leading to optimizer preferring items and gems with extra Hit.
WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] Misery/Improved Faerie Fire not adding 3% Hit

Comments.Message:
It is listed, it is just listed under hit from Buffs instead of Misery/IFF. For my own lock it does calculate this in the optimizer. It shows as 14% in my charscreen but if you mouseover the % it should say 100% hit in the last 2 lines.
Please check again if this is not the case for you. If not, can you give me the name and realm of you char? Saves me playing with talents to find where it bugs.
The Hit display is fixed for the next release.
